data.quote: Life is like going the wrong way on a moving sidewalk. Walk and you stay put. Stand still and you go backwards. To get ahead you have to hustle
data.author: Farrelly Brothers- Shared by Casey Neistat

data.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. Until your good is better and your better is best.
data.author: Tim Duncan

data.quote: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.
data.author: Winston Churchill
